info.title: OPERA Cloud Reservation Asynchronous API
info.description:
APIs to cater for Reservation Asynchronous functionality in OPERA Cloud. This includes viewing reservation data along with its revenue.

This API follows an async pattern where

  • You make an initial request, which returns a Location header
  • You poll HEAD on the Location header returned to obtain the status of the process
  • Once the process completes HEAD will return in the Location header the URL that must be called to obtain the results of the process
  • You call the URL to obtain the results of the process


Compatible with OPERA Cloud release 22.4.0.0.

post.summary: Fetch past, present and future Reservations Daily Summary
post.description:
Use this API to get a reservation daily summary for a property within a given date range. Maximum limit of date range is 94 days, but the recommendation is to use a date range proportionate to the size of the hotel. Returns a header parameter Location that can be used in the getReservationsProcessStatus operation. Use event driven APIs (see https://docs.oracle.com/cd/F29336_01/doc.201/f27480/c_business_events.htm#OHIPU-BusinessEvents-F0AC1F1C) to get real time reservation updates.

OperationId:startReservationsDailySummaryProcess

parameters.name: criteria
parameters.description: Request object for fetching future reservations asynchronously.

head.summary: Check status of Reservation Daily Summary process
head.description:
Use this to check whether the process to generate reservations daily summaries is complete. You can get value of summaryId from the Location header returned by the startReservationsDailySummaryProcess operation.

OperationId:getReservationsProcessStatus

Cache-Control.description: number of seconds to wait before polling again.

200.description: Response for status of scheduled asynchronous process.

Location.description: Location of newly created resource once the status of process run is Complete.

201.description: Response for status of scheduled asynchronous process.

get.summary: Get results of Reservations Daily Summary
get.description:
Use this API to retrieve a property's reservation daily summary within the dates given in the startReservationsDailySummaryProcess API request. You can get the value of the summaryId from the Location header returned by the getReservationsProcessStatus operation after the process is completed.

OperationId:getReservationsDailySummary
